person.persName: Aaron Lawson (Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer and court clerk)

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer and court clerk. Barren County, Kentucky, native. Married to Ursula A. Walker Lawson in August 1858. Father of Sarah A. Lawson, Robert N. Lawson, and Emer Lawson. Apprentice tanner, under William H. Clark, in Barren County in 1850. Farmer in Edmonson County in 1860. Clerk of the Edmonson Circuit Court from 1863 to 1867. Clerk of the Edmonson County Court from 1863 to 1865.
